CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Customer Purchase stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {above} the Customer Purchase stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Customer Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Customer Purchase is {418}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {1435}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Retail Placement, with a value of {1435}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {359}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {599} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {59} Thousand Bottles from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {418} Thousand Bottles from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 627? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Retail Placement} stage has {1435}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {836}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 388? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 388 and 1135? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {In-Store Promotion} stage has {836}, the {Customer Purchase} stage has {418}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase, or from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {In-Store Promotion} to {Customer Purchase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Retail Placement} to stage {In-Store Promotion} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Retail Placement} and {In-Store Promotion} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
